pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extracts the Backbone from Weighted Graphs // Provides methods for extracting from a weighted graph a binary or signed backbone that retains only the significant edges. The user may input a weighted graph, or a bipartite graph from which a weighted graph is first constructed via projection. Backbone extraction methods include the stochastic degree sequence model (Neal, Z. P. (2014). doi:10.1016/j.socnet.2014.06.001), hypergeometric model (Neal, Z. (2013). doi:10.1007/s13278-013-0107-y), the fixed degree sequence model (Zweig, K. A., and Kaufmann, M. (2011). doi:10.1007/s13278-011-0021-0), fixed column model, fixed fill model, as well as a universal threshold method.
